item.title: OrCAD simulation and PCB production
item.description: Orcard error list # ORCAP-1605 Two references have same name in different schematic. Footprint # C:\Cadence\SPB_17.4\share\pcb\pcb_lib\symbols Within this folder, you can double-click on the .dra files to see footprints and the .pad files to see padstacks in PCB Editor. SnapEDA, UltraLibrarian or Samacsys or use Place - Search Providers from within OrCAD Capture References # OrCAD/Allegro V17.2-2016 footprints parallel-systems.co.uk Backup file orcad.co.uk Finding existing PCB footprints for Cadence PCB Editor
